DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to exposure._A medical product, practice, or application that is tested in a clinical trial._Pertaining to an entirety or whole, also constituting the full quantity or extent; complete; derived by addition._Passage through time; duration; a systematic or/and orderly succession; a sequence, e.g. course of treatment; a mode of action or behavior; natural development, typical manner of proceeding._The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
